hero.headline: We Build Digital Products That Scale
hero.subheading: Transform your ideas into powerful mobile and web applications using cutting-edge Flutter and Laravel technologies. From MVP to enterprise-grade solutions.

valueProposition.title: Why Choose Our Studio?
valueProposition.subtitle: We combine technical excellence with business understanding to deliver solutions that drive growth
valueProposition.feature1_desc: Flutter development that delivers native performance across iOS, Android, and web platforms from a single codebase
valueProposition.feature2_desc: Laravel expertise for secure, scalable APIs and web applications with elegant architecture and rapid development
valueProposition.feature3_desc: We understand the urgency of launching. Our streamlined process gets your MVP to market 40% faster than traditional development

stepDetails.launch_activities: Production deployment, monitoring setup, user acceptance testing, and handover documentation.

hero.title: Building Digital
hero.subtitle: We're a passionate team of developers and designers dedicated to creating exceptional digital experiences that drive business growth and user satisfaction.

stats.title: Our
stats.subtitle: Key milestones that define our growth and commitment to excellence

story.title: Our
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2024, PoMi Apps emerged from a simple belief: great software should be accessible to everyone. We started as a small team with big dreams, focusing on Flutter and Laravel technologies to create solutions that matter.
story.paragraph2: Our journey began when we realized that many businesses struggle with technology decisions and development processes. We set out to simplify this by offering transparent, high-quality development services that deliver real results.
story.paragraph3: Today, we're proud to have helped numerous startups and businesses bring their digital visions to life. Our commitment to excellence, transparency, and customer success remains at the heart of everything we do.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the most trusted development partner for startups and businesses worldwide, delivering innovative solutions that drive growth and create lasting impact.

values.title: Our
values.subtitle: The principles that guide every decision we make and every project we deliver

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: We love what we do and bring enthusiasm to every project, ensuring exceptional results for our clients.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for perfection in every line of code and every design decision, never compromising on quality.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We believe in transparent communication and working closely with our clients as true partners.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously explore new technologies and methodologies to deliver cutting-edge solutions.

team.subtitle: The passionate individuals behind every successful project

team.developersBio: Skilled developers specializing in mobile and web technologies, committed to delivering high-quality, scalable applications.
